price: 难道他们要舍安拉的宗教而寻求别的宗教吗？同时天地万物，不论自愿与否，都归顺他，他们将来只被召归于他。
arabic: أَفَغَيۡرَ دِينِ ٱللَّهِ يَبۡغُونَ وَلَهُۥٓ أَسۡلَمَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡعٗا وَكَرۡهٗا وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaghayra dīni al-lahi yabghūna walahu aslama man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭawʿan wakarhan wa-ilayhi yur'jaʿūna
